availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Hancock County, Kentucky, farmer. Married to Catherine Alsop. Father of Lewis Alsop and Alexander Alsop. Member of the Masonic Order at Hancock Lodge, No. 115 in Hawesville, Kentucky.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, Hawesville Voting District, p. 25.
Proceedings of the Grand Lodge of Kentucky, at a Grand Annual Communication, in the City of Louisville, Commencing on Monday, the 21st Day of October, 1867 (Frankfort, Ky.: Frankfort Commonwealth, 1867), 111-112.
Proceedings of the Grand Lodge of Kentucky, F.. AND A.. M.. Ninety-Eighth Annual Communication held in Louisville, Kentucky. (Louisville: Masonic Home Books and Job Office, 1897), 24.
